text: xahˌ lu lki tab makmay nan chxb hak phwk khea ca samarth thahı phwk cea klab pen phu ptiseth kar sraththa xik thangni pheraa khwam xiccha risʹya thima cak taw khxng phwk khea xeng hlangcak khwam cring di pracaksʹ kæ phwk khea dangnan phwk cea cng hıxphay læa beuxn hna seiy cn kwa xallxhˌ ca prathan kha sang khxng phraxngkh ma thæ cring xallxhˌ nan thrng dechanuphaph henux thuk sing
